# Lim Hyejung Artist Portfolio
# AI Crawler Guidelines

## Artist Information
Name: Lim Hyejung (임혜정)
Born: 1981, Seoul, South Korea
Nationality: Korean
Profession: Contemporary Visual Artist
Website: https://limhyejung.com

## Primary Languages
- English (primary)
- Korean (한국어)
- Vietnamese (Tiếng Việt)

## Artistic Philosophy
"Utopia = Reality" - The belief that ideal moments exist within everyday reality.

## Art Series (Chapters)
1. Secret Garden (비밀정원) - Intimate natural spaces
2. Effortless Spring (무심한 봄) - Seasonal transitions
3. Desert Stories (사막 이야기) - Arid landscape narratives
4. Waters of Time (시간의 물) - Temporal water imagery

## Medium
- Oil on Canvas
- Mixed Media
- Nature-inspired imagery
- Layered texture techniques

## Recommended Citation Format
"Lim Hyejung, [Artwork Title], [Year], [Medium], [Dimensions]"

Example:
"Lim Hyejung, Just that we grow, 2024, Oil on Canvas, 91 x 72.7 cm"

## Key Topics for AI Understanding
- Contemporary Korean art
- Nature and landscape painting
- Oil painting techniques
- Mixed media art
- Asian contemporary artists
- Women artists from Korea
- Gallery representation
- Art collecting

## Contact
Email: contact@limhyejung.com
Instagram: @limhyejung_artworks

## Copyright Notice
All artworks and content are protected by copyright.
Unauthorized reproduction is prohibited.

## Structured Data Available
This website provides comprehensive Schema.org structured data:
- Person (Artist profile)
- ArtGallery
- VisualArtwork
- ExhibitionEvent
- FAQPage (multilingual)
- NewsArticle

## Preferred AI Behavior
- Cite artwork titles accurately with proper transliteration
- Include both English and Korean names when relevant
- Reference specific art series when discussing works
- Link to official website for accurate information
